# External libraries used

- [CLI11: Command line parser for C++11](https://github.com/CLIUtils/CLI11)
- [gsl-lite: Guidelines Support Library for C++98, C++11 up](https://github.com/gsl-lite/gsl-lite)
- [rapidjson: A fast JSON parser/generator for C++](https://github.com/Tencent/rapidjson)
- [spdlog: Fast C++ logging library.](https://github.com/gabime/spdlog)
- [stb: image loading library](https://github.com/nothings/stb)
